title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 327.1 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 327.1 - Definitions

State Regulations
(a) Chair shall
mean the chairman, chairwoman or chair of the Workers' Compensation Board of
the State of New York. (b) Carrier
shall mean an employer or its workers' compensation insurance carrier, if
insured. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
327.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
